id: Claire McCaskill slams 'crazy Democrats' -- and her GOP opponent -- to save Senate seat
paragraph: By Dana Bash and Bridget Nolan, CNNUpdated 7:57 AM ET, Wed October 31, 2018 Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds. (CNN)Democrat Claire McCaskill's campaign RV rolls deep into rural, conservative Missouri.
